misuse: CWE-327: Use of a Broken or Risky Cryptographic Algorithm
description: The AES/GCM/NoPadding algorithm is a broken or risky cryptographic algorithm because it uses a non-standardized algorithm that has not been widely reviewed by the cryptographic community. It is recommended to use the standard AES/GCM algorithm instead.
recommendation: Replace the use of the AES/GCM/NoPadding algorithm with the standard AES/GCM algorithm.
